setup_commands: (command -v mamba >/dev/null 2>&1 && mamba create -p ./env python=3.11 pip -y) || (command -v conda >/dev/null 2>&1 && conda create -p ./env python=3.11 pip -y) || (echo "Warning: Neither mamba nor conda found, creating venv instead" && python3 -m venv ./env)
./env/bin/pip install torch numpy scipy biopython loguru click pandas tqdm
cd repo/DRfold2 && bash install.sh && cd Arena && make Arena && cd ../../

(command -v mamba >/dev/null 2>&1 && mamba install -p ./env -c conda-forge openmm -y) || (command -v conda >/dev/null 2>&1 && conda install -p ./env -c conda-forge openmm -y) || echo "Warning: Neither mamba nor conda found, skipping openmm installation"
